record.title: COMPREHENSIVE IMMIGRATION REFORM ACT OF 2007--MOTION TO PROCEED

speaking.paragraph: I move to proceed to calendar No. 144, S. 1348 and send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the vote on the cloture motion occur on Wednesday, May 16, at a time determined by the majority leader, following consultation with the Republican leader, and that the mandatory quorum required under rule XXII be waived, and I now withdraw the motion to proceed.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
